channel.title: How do I get more people to listen to my songs
channel.description:
So I’ve seen a few of these topics pop up but none of them have really answered my question. I do often post songs in the disco, and the threads are ignored. I also post on discord to no avail. Can anyone help me because I’m a bit desperate. I used to be Vulture, and since I changed my name I’m getting a lot less recognition :(
Here’s my link https://soundcloud.com/aquax

item.title: How do I get more people to listen to my songs

item.description:
You gotta interact with people, not just post ur stuff

Read full topic

item.title: How do I get more people to listen to my songs
item.dc:creator: TXA
item.description:
Frickin get on discord and join as many servers as possible and start getting involved with other people who share the same sort of style. Promo ur stuff where u can and that’s sure to help.

item.title: How do I get more people to listen to my songs
item.dc:creator: Arimyth
item.description:
Posting to the disco and to discord promotional channels is a small part of it.

  1. Do repost trades
  2. Build a legitimate and engaged follower base
  3. Find music groups on Facebook or Reddit to share to
  4. Submit your song to repost networks on SoundCloud
  5. Don’t stress about it more than doing those 4 things and enjoy music without getting caught up in listening stats

Read full topic
item.source: How do I get more people to listen to my songs
